topic.title: Why do I get an "SSL negotiation failed" error?

section.title: Error message: "SSL negotiation failed: SSL disabled due to library version mismatch"
section.p: Check to see if other versions of the above files are on your computer. If so, make sure that any entry in the system path that points to the is later in the path than the entry for the Subversion files. If they are earlier in the path, Subversion will attempt to use them and, if incompatible, an error will occur. For example, if an incompatible version of the file ssleay32.dll is used, you will see the message "SSL negotiation failed: SSL disabled due to library version mismatch".http://www.oracle.com/technology/products/jdev/htdocs/partners/addins/exchange/subversion/subversion.html
